title: Beyond Tomorrow 1940 | American Christmas film | directed by A. Edward Sutherland

sources.title: Beyond Tomorrow 1940 | American Christmas film | directed by A. Edward Sutherland
sources.description:
George, Allan, and Michaelâ€”celebrate Christmas Eve by inviting strangers to dinner, forming bonds that bring love and hope to a young couple, James and Jean. Tragedy strikes when the engineers die in a plane crash, but their spirits linger to guide James, who is tempted by fame and a manipulative starlet, Arlene. As love and redemption intertwine, James is granted a miraculous second chance, and the engineers find peace in the afterlife.


Original title: Beyond Tomorrow & Alternative title: Beyond Christmas / And So Goodbye

Colorized version https://youtu.be/qdFwDEXp5uw


Director: A. Edward Sutherland
Writers: Adele Comandini, Mildred Cram
Genres: Classics, Christmas, Drama, Fantasy, Romance 
Starring: Harry Carey,  C. Aubrey Smith, Charles Winninger, Maria Ouspenskaya, Helen Vinson, Rod La Rocque


00:00 George, Allan, and Michael host a Christmas party with a fateful invitation to strangers
05:21 James Houston and Arlene Terry accept the millionaires' unconventional New Year's Eve wager
15:45 A tragic plane crash claims the three benefactors during an urgent business trip
30:10 The ghosts witness James struggling with newfound wealth and industry pressures
45:30 Arlene confronts James about his changing priorities during emotional train station farewell
1:00:15 Spectral trio intervenes to prevent James' marriage to manipulative socialite Diane
1:14:31 George performs final ghostly miracle to reunite lovers at critical midnight hour
